lead_paragraph: The Avenement has been condemned, in the person of its responsible editor, to six months' imprisonment; and 1000 francs fine. The deliberation of the Jury was not long. The defense of the counsel for The Avenement was admirable, but so it must be admitted was the speech of the Advocate General. It was as free as possible from mere declamation but was forcible on every point calculated to make an impression on the jury.
